LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.Clarification:
"In range" below considers allowed areas when undrafted, but ignores them when drafted.

Forbidden targets are ignored unless drafted.
This includes checking if they are in allowed areas, or reserved by a pawn.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.NoNonexistentDefs: No nonexistent defs configured, nothing to do here.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.Uninstall.Explanation:
Removes all elements of this mod from the currently loaded game so you can safely uninstall the mod.
Creates a backup save both before and after the removal, then puts you in the main menu.

Also turns off autocasting for all patched psycasts. For technical reasons, this does not check if they can be autocast without the mod and may need to be re-enabled on reload.

Only works if you currently have a save loaded.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.Uninstall: Uninstall the mod from the current game
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.Uninstall.Disabled: Load a save to uninstall this mod from it
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.BlockedJobs.Explanatio: Manage which jobs should not be interrupted for autocasting.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.BlockedJobs.Manager.Ex: A list of all JobDefs and a toggle on if it should not be interrupted for autocasting.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.BlockedJobs.Nonexisten: JobDefs that don't exist but are still configured.\nBecause they are from uninstalled mods, removed by updates, etc.\nThey can be kept without problem or cleaned up here.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_AdrenalineRush.Exp: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_BladeFocus.Explana: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_ControlledFrenzy.E: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_Darkvision.Explana: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.\nOtherwise will target the closest non-downed psychically sensitive colonist without the buff in casting range.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_Deathshield.Explan: Targets the closest pawn without death shield in range, prioritizing by group in the order below.\nThat is, targets colonists firsts, then colony animals if no colonists are available, and so on.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_Eclipse.Explanatio: Will autocast when there is no ongoing eclipse
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_EnchantQuality.Exp:
Will look for enchantable items in the order listed below.

When looking for items in "appropriately named" places, will look for names containing the word "enchant".
For example: `Enchanting`, `enchant`, `The Enchantress of Florence`
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_Enthrall.Explanati:
Will look for corpses in the order listed below.

When looking for items in "appropriately named" places, will look for names containing the word "thrall".
For example: `Thrall corpses`, `Enthralling`, `thrall`
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_FiringFocus.Explan: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_GuidedShot.Explana: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_IceShield.Explanat: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.\nOtherwise will target the closest non-downed psychic sensitive pawn without the buff in casting range, in the order below.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_FireShield.Explana: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.\nOtherwise will target the closest non-downed psychic sensitive pawn without the buff in casting range, in the order below.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_StaticAura.Explana: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.\nOtherwise will target the closest non-downed psychic sensitive pawn without the buff in casting range, in the order below.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_Invisibility.Expla: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.\nOtherwise will target the closest non-downed psychic sensitive colonist without the buff in casting range.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_Overshield.Explana: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.\nOtherwise will target the closest non-downed psychic sensitive colonist without the buff in casting range.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_IceCrystal.Explana: Will create ice crystals on a random cell in the Ice Crystal Spot area.\nWill only target cells without buildings.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_SolarPinhole.Expla: Will create solar pinholes on a random cell in the Solar Pinhole Spot area.\nWill only target cells that don't already have a solar pinhole.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_SolarPinholeSunlam: Preferred to normal solar pinhole if both are available to cast. Will create solar pinholes on a random cell in the Solar Pinhole Spot area.\nWill only target cells that don't already have a solar pinhole.\nLarge and normal solar pinholes will prevent the other from being created at that spot.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_Mend.Explanation:
Will look for damaged items in the order listed below.

When looking for items in "appropriately named" places, will look for names containing the word "mend".
For example: `Mending`, `mend`, `The First Amendment`
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_PsychicGuidance.Ex: Targets a random non-downed psychically sensitive colonist in range that doesn't have the Psychic Guidance buff.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_SpeedBoost.Explana: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_StealVitality.Expl: Targets the pawn with highest psychic sensitivity in range, ignoring those that have no psychic sensitivity, prioritizing by group in the order below.\nThat is, target prisoners first, if no prisoners are available, then target slaves, and so on.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_WordofImmunity.Exp: Will target the closest pawn in range with an immunizable disease that does not have the Psychic Immunity buff, prioritizing by group in the order below.\nThat is, target colonists first, if no colonists are available, then target colony animals, and so on.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_WordofJoy.Explanat: Targets the closest non-downed psychically sensitive colonist in range without the Joyfuzz effect.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_WordofProductivity: Targets a random non-downed colonist in range that doesn't have the Productivity buff.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_WordofSerenity.Exp: Targets the closest psychically sensitive pawn in range with an ongoing mental state.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPEP_BrainLeech.Explan: Targets the closest psychically sensitive pawn in range, prioritzing by group in the order below.\nThat is, target prisoners first, if no prisoners are available, then target slaves.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.AutocastIntervalDrafte: Autocasting interval while drafted (only applies to patched psycasts)
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.AutocastIntervalUndraf: Autocasting interval while undrafted (only applies to patched psycasts)
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.MendHealthThreshold.De: Maximum health for an item to be auto-targeted
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.MendOnlyNamedStockpile: Only mend items in appropriately named stockpiles
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.MendOnlyNamedStorageGr: Only mend items in appropriately named storage groups
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.EnchantOnlyNamedStockp: Only enchant items in appropriately named stockpiles
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.EnchantOnlyNamedStorag: Only enchant items in appropriately named storage groups
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.EnthrallOnlyNamedStock: Only enthrall corpses in appropriately named stockpiles
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.EnthrallOnlyNamedStora: Only enthrall corpses in appropriately named storage groups
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.WordOfJoyMoodThreshold: Maximum mood for a pawn to be auto-targeted
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.IgnoredMentalStates.Ex: Manage which mental states should not be targeted by pawns autocasting Word of Serenity.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.IgnoredMentalStates.Ma: A list of all MentalStateDefs and a toggle on if they should not be targeted by pawns autocasting by Word of Serenity.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.IgnoredMentalStates.No: MentalStateDefs that don't exist but are still configured.\nBecause they are from uninstalled mods, removed by updates, etc.\nThey can be kept without problem or cleaned up here.
